show.subtitle: Specific information about using evidenced based natural health choices, with knowledgeable authors, guests and hosts.
show.title: The Natural Nurse

header.title: Hypothyroidism & Hashimoto’s Disease: Everything you need to know to get well.

title: Hypothyroidism & Hashimoto’s Disease: Everything you need to know to get well.
content:
Host Ellen Kamhi, PhD RN, www.naturalnurse.com, interviews Dr. Nikolas Hedberg. Dr. <!--more--> Hedberg is a board certified naturopathic physician, chiropractic physician and he is board certified in nutrition by the american clinical board of nutrition.
He is the founder of the Immune Restoration Center in Asheville, NC where he helps patients worldwide with thyroid disorders, autoimmune diseases and a variety of chronic illnesses.
Through his large telemedicine practice he is able to help patients regardless of their location.
Dr Hedberg is a regular speaker at integrative medicine conferences, author and practitioners of all types consult with him on their most difficult cases.
Dr Hedberg is the author of the book The Thyroid Alternative and the upcoming book The Complete Thyroid Health and Diet Guide which will be published in the Spring of 2015.
His website is www.drhedberg.com
